snippet: Seven teenagers were arrested after a string of assaults against fellow teens in Hudson Falls, N.Y. Police continue to search for a motive in the attacks, which were recorded on cellphones and shown to friends.
abstract: Police in Hudson Falls, NY, say that they have arrested seven local teenagers who participated in series of attacks on other minors; in each case, alleged perpetrators and witnesses documented beatings on cellphones and showed recordings to friends.

byline.contributor: Thomas Kaplan contributed reporting from Albany.

lead_paragraph: Seven teenagers were arrested after a string of assaults against fellow teens in Hudson Falls, N.Y. Police continue to search for a motive in the attacks, which were recorded on cellphones and shown to friends.
